body: Double sided and flip card images can be transformed by clicking on the CardViewer but should add some sort of visual indicator.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Add transformable indicator to CardViewer
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 21, 2014 14:34:25_

Double sided and flip card images can be transformed by clicking on the CardViewer but should add some sort of visual indicator.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=659_
